com.tbg.strategy.utils

Class PositionTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tbg.strategy.utils.PositionTracker

  • public class PositionTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    PositionTracker

    Gives the status for a given symbol. Checks if exists a position for the given symbol or if exists a pending/processing state order. This is a useful class to avoid to open a double position/order.
    History:
    - [20/dic/2012] Created. (sfl)
    Author:
    sfl
